titles.title: Expressing support for designation of the week of April 13, 2009, through April 17, 2009, as "Protect Your Pharmacy Week", and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

bill.summary: 4/2/2009--Introduced. Expresses support for the designation of Protect Your Pharmacy Week. Encourages pharmacies to take steps to reduce their vulnerability to theft.
